类 Photos13UIController

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Photos13UIController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for the entirety of the UI

      A universal method used to operate set functions after closing the TargetAlbumChooser window

      Identifying the appropriate action after a button is pressed
      Photos13.Photos13UIController.Operations getOperation(int type)
      Depending on the desired operation, excute a window change.
      void InitializeAlbumChooserPage(User u)
      Initialize the album chooser page.

      Initilize the album page.
      void InitializeAlbumPhotoPage(Album a)
      Initialize the photo page.
      void InitializeSearchResultPage(Album a)
      Initialize the search result page.
      void ReadInputOperations()
      A universal method used to operate set functions after receiving input 1 -> Add new Album 2 -> Rename selected Album 3 -> Add New Photo to Album 4 -> Caption/Recaption selected Photo 5 -> Transition to operation 6 6 -> Add new tag(TagType, TagName) to selected Photo 7 -> Transition to operation 8 8 -> Delete specific tag(TagType, TagName) from selected Photo 9 -> Create new Album for search results
      void setAPButton(int mode)
      A method used to control the button availables in photo page 1 -> Not selected mode, Add, Go Through and Search buttons become available, other buttons become not available 2 -> Selected mode, Add, Go Through and Search buttons become not available, other buttons become available 3 -> Special: Search mode, all buttons except Return become unavailable
      void setCellClickEvent(javafx.scene.layout.Pane cellContainer, int currentindex)
      Implements the cell click event.
      void setSearchButton(boolean mode)
      Set search button depending on the desired mode.
      void setUAPButton(boolean mode)
      A method used to control the button availables in album page true -> Add & Search button becomes available, other buttons become not available false -> Add & Search button becomes not available, other buttons become available
      java.lang.String setupFileSelector(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Set up the file selector.
      void TwoButtonsOperation(boolean leftbutton)
      A universal method used to operate set functions after closing the TwoButton window 1 -> Initialize GoThrough window with direction 2 -> Search by Date or Search by Tags 3 -> Search by Single Tag or Search by Two Tags
      void UpdateGoThroughPhoto()
      A specific method used to update the GoThrough Photo imageView
      void UpdatePhotoData(EachPhoto p)
      A method called after a change to a photo's caption/tags has been made The method goes through every album in each user and replace copies of Photos with same path with the provided Photo data
      void windowTransfer(javafx.scene.layout.Pane p1, javafx.scene.layout.Pane p2, Photos13.Photos13UIController.Operations o)
      Handle window transfers (e.g. opening a new window, closing a window, new scene, opening error message, closing error message)

      • InitializeAlbumChooserPage

        public void InitializeAlbumChooserPage(User u)
        Initialize the album chooser page. Note that this page is distinct than the page of an individual album. The album chooser page displays the albums of a particular user.
        参数:
        u -

      • setUAPButton

        public void setUAPButton(boolean mode)
        A method used to control the button availables in album page true -> Add & Search button becomes available, other buttons become not available false -> Add & Search button becomes not available, other buttons become available
        参数:
        mode -

      • setAPButton

        public void setAPButton(int mode)
        A method used to control the button availables in photo page 1 -> Not selected mode, Add, Go Through and Search buttons become available, other buttons become not available 2 -> Selected mode, Add, Go Through and Search buttons become not available, other buttons become available 3 -> Special: Search mode, all buttons except Return become unavailable
        参数:
        mode -

      • setSearchButton

        public void setSearchButton(boolean mode)
        Set search button depending on the desired mode.
        参数:
        mode -

      • ReadInputOperations

        public void ReadInputOperations()
        A universal method used to operate set functions after receiving input 1 -> Add new Album 2 -> Rename selected Album 3 -> Add New Photo to Album 4 -> Caption/Recaption selected Photo 5 -> Transition to operation 6 6 -> Add new tag(TagType, TagName) to selected Photo 7 -> Transition to operation 8 8 -> Delete specific tag(TagType, TagName) from selected Photo 9 -> Create new Album for search results

        参数:
        leftbutton -

      • UpdatePhotoData

        public void UpdatePhotoData(EachPhoto p)
        A method called after a change to a photo's caption/tags has been made The method goes through every album in each user and replace copies of Photos with same path with the provided Photo data
        参数:
        p -
